name: Junkyard Collector
description:
Welcome to the world of robotic creation! As the owner of a bustling junkyard, you must collect various robotic parts to fulfill the requests of your customers. To obtain these parts, you'll need to complete a range of objectives and search through crates and boxes scattered throughout your junkyard.

As you build more robots and attract a greater clientele, your reputation will grow, and you'll gain access to new and exciting parts and upgrades to enhance your creations. Each customer will present unique challenges, and you'll need to utilize all of your skills and creativity to meet their requests.

With each successful build, you'll be one step closer to becoming the ultimate robotic creator. So, are you ready to dive into the exciting world of robotic collection and construction? Let's get started!
